name: Your Strength Is Mine - GMTKJam 2021
description:
"Your Strength Is Mine" is an arcade tank game where you consume your defeated foes to grow stronger, each enemy tank you consume gives you armor and weaponry as well as allowing you access to abilities, take care though your abilities also consume your armor and as your armor breaks so too do your added weapons.

Abilities: Shield generates a shield around you draining your armor over time but protecting you from all damage, shooting while the shield is up will cause it to drain considerably faster. Dodge boosts you in the direction you are moving and costs a low amount of armor to use.

Controls:

Move with "WASD" or "Arrow Keys" and Aim using the mouse

LMB = Shoot

RMB = Shield,

Left Shift = Dodge
